title: PTI won’t be allowed to repeat May 9 incident: Dr Tariq
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 23 (APP):Senior leader of Pakistan Muslim League-N, Dr Tariq Fazal Chaudhry on Friday said that government would not allow Pakistan Tehreek e Insaf (PTI), to repeat May 9 like riots in any part of the country.
The PTI had the agenda to spread chaos by arranging public meeting in different areas, he said while talking to a private television channel. The PTI supporters and workers would not be permitted to repeat the same incident anywhere
In reply to a question about PTI founder’s trial, he said that after high profile arrest, it might be possible that the case of May 9, would be held in the military courts.
To another question regarding Bilawal Bhutto Zardari’s meeting with the Federal Government, he said there is no rift between the Pakistan Peoples Party and Pakistan Muslim League-N.
All the public related matters are being resolved through negotiations, he added.
Tariq Chaudhary further said that federal and the Punjab governments had provided relief to the people on electricity bills and we want similar action in other provinces.
